akn:section.akn:heading: Determinations with respect to annual income

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In determining annual income under this chapter, all payments of any kind or from any source (including salary, retirement or annuity payments, or similar income, which has been waived, irrespective of whether the waiver was made pursuant to statute, contract, or otherwise) shall be included except—
(b) Where a fraction of a dollar is involved, annual income shall be fixed at the next lower dollar.
